  1. News Flash

News Flash

  1. Mosquito Control - Aerial Applications

    Mosquito Control applications for the 2019 season will begin on Wednesday, April 10th in the areas of: Chapman Swamp, Hesspar Swamp and McGowan Swamp. Rain date(s) are Thurs 4/11 & Fri 4/12. Additional Info...

  2. Westerly Mooring Registration

    Annual Mooring registrations for the 2019 boating season now being accepted. Additional Info...

  1. Tax Collector's Tax Sale

    Collector's Sale of Estates for Taxes and/or Assessments Due and Unpaid will be held on Thursday, April 11th at 10:00 AM in the Municipal Courtroom of the Westerly Town Hall, 45 Broad St. Additional Info...
